title.rendered: MIAT Mongolian Airlines in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia

content.rendered:
MIAT Mongolian Airlines is the Mongolian national airline, headquartered in the MIAT Building in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. It was founded in 1956. The airline operates international scheduled services from its base at Chinggis Khaan International Airportnear Ulaanbaatar.

MIAT Mongolian Airlines Contact Address, Phone, Email, Fax and Website

MIAT Mongolian Airlines Address : MIAT JSC, 17120 Ulaanbaatar city, Khan-Uul district,
Buyant-Ukhaa 45

Phone number : 976-70049992
Fax: 976-70049919

Customer service: 976-70049967
Email: customerservice@miat.co

List of Offices in MIAT Mongolian Airlines

BEIJING BRANCH OFFICE

Room # 705, 7th floor, Sunjoy Mansion Jianguomenwai, Ritan Lu # 6 100020 Beijing, China
Telphone: 86-132-4014-5993 (Beijing)
Telphone: 85-29-355-3303 (Hong Kong)
Fax: 86-10- 6507-7397
E-mail: beijing@miat.com

SEOUL BRANCH OFFICE

9th Floor, Soonhwa Building 5-2 Soonhwa-Dong, Chung-Gu, Seoul 100-130, Korea
Telphone: 82-010-5635-3366
Fax: 82-2-756 9762
E-mail: seoul@miat.com

TOKYO BRANCH OFFICE

5F, Tachibana Bldg, 2-19-4 Nishinippori, Arakawa-ku, Tokyo 116-0013, Japan
Telphone: 81-03-5615 4653
Fax: 81-03-5615 4665
E-mail: tokyo@miat.com

MOSCOW BRANCH OFFICE

Moscow 121099 Spasopeskovskii Pereulok D7 / 1
Telphone: + 7-499-241 10-52, + 7-499-241 07-54, + 7-495-578 83-19
Fax: 7-499-241-37-57
E-mail: moscow@miat.com

BERLIN BRANCH OFFICE

Chaussee Strasse 84, Berlin 10115, Germany
Telphone: 49-17-627 856 296
Fax: 49-30-284 981 40
E-mail: berlin@miat.com

MIAT Mongolian Airlines Official website : https://www.miat.com/

Fleet size: 06

  • Boeing 737-800
  • Boeing 737 MAX 8
  • Boeing 767-300ER
  • Boeing 787-9

MIAT Mongolian Airlines Baggage Allowance

View MIAT Mongolian Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Traveling while Pregnant Women in MIAT Mongolian Airlines

  • Passengers with pregnancy between 28 weeks and 34 weeks must submit a doctor’s medical certificate.

For more details: http://miat.com/pagecontent.php?pageId=55&lang=mn

Traveling with Pets

  • Pets are permitted in MIAT Mongolian Airlines (dogs and cats)

For more details: http://miat.com/pagecontent.php?pageId=62&lang=mn

Queries handled by MIAT Mongolian Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Blue Sky Mongolia

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the MIAT Mongolian Airlines office in Mongolia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the MIAT Mongolian Airlines office in Mongolia: (click on the stars below)
